questions.text:
#### Q1. What type of line connects the two shapes shown below?

![Two shapes connected with lines](images/Q1.png?raw=png)

- %OPTION% custom Pen tool line
- %OPTION% straight connection line
- %OPTION% curved connection line
- %OPTION% angled connection line

#### Q2. Which animation effect controls how an element leaves the screen?

- %OPTION% Build in
- %OPTION% Build Order
- %OPTION% Action
- %OPTION% Build Out

#### Q3. For the shown below, how can you make the landscape photo fit cleanly within the circle shape?

![Landscape photo with circle shape](images/Q3.png?raw=png)

- %OPTION% Select the photo and the shape, then click **Arrange > Image > Reset Mask**.
- %OPTION% Select the photo and the shape, then click **Arrange > Image > Mask with Selection**.
- %OPTION% Copy the photo to your Clipboard and paste it inside of the shape.
- %OPTION% Select the photo and the shape, then click **Format > Image > Mask with Selection**.

#### Q4. You want a clock and countdown timer to display, only to you, while you're giving your Keynote presentation. How do you configure this?

- %OPTION% Click **Play > Customize Presenter Display**.
- %OPTION% Click **Keynote > Preferences**, then select the **Remote** tab.
- %OPTION% Click **Keynote > Preferences**, then select the **Slideshow** tab.
- %OPTION% Click **Play > Rehearse Slideshow**.

#### Q5. When presenting a slideshow, how can you proceed to the next slide? (Choose 3 items.)

A. Press the M key.
B. Press the P key.
C. Press the Right Arrow key.
D. Press the ] key.
E. Press the Down Arrow key.

- %OPTION% A, B, D
- %OPTION% A, B, C
- %OPTION% B, C, D
- %OPTION% C, D, E

#### Q6. When you're presenting a Keynote slideshow, how can you display a script or similar information that only you can see?

- %OPTION% Use the **Outline** view.
- %OPTION% Click **Insert > Script**.
- %OPTION% Use the **Comments** view.
- %OPTION% Use the **Presenter Notes** view.

#### Q7. What type of chart can you manipulate during a presentation to change the information that is displayed?

- %OPTION% 2D
- %OPTION% 3D
- %OPTION% Interactive
- %OPTION% Live Data

#### Q8. You build a Keynote presentation but decide that you want to give it a new look. What's the easiest way to do this?

- %OPTION% Click **View > Edit Master Slides**.
- %OPTION% In the **Format inspector**, click the **Change Master** button.
- %OPTION% Click **File > Change Theme**.
- %OPTION% Make a new presentation and copy and paste the content onto new slides.

#### Q9. Which video format is best suited for use with Keynote?

- %OPTION% MP3
- %OPTION% MP4
- %OPTION% AVI
- %OPTION% FLV

#### Q10. How can you print presenter notes?

- %OPTION% In the **Print** dialog box, select **Grid**.
- %OPTION% In the **Print** dialog box, select **Outline**.
- %OPTION% In the **Print** dialog box, select **Page Attributes**.
- %OPTION% In the **Print** dialog box, select **Handout**.

#### Q11. What technique was used to transform the circle shown below into the new shape on the right?

![Circle and transformed version of circle](images/Q11.png?raw=png)

- %OPTION% Right-click the shape and select **Make Editable**.
- %OPTION% Use the Pen tool to customize the shape.
- %OPTION% Hold down the Option key and click a point.
- %OPTION% Double-click the shape.

#### Q12. Which animation method creates movement based on the position of an object across two consecutive slides?

- %OPTION% Object Push
- %OPTION% Magic Move
- %OPTION% Move In
- %OPTION% Fade and Move

#### Q13. How can you invite multiple users to make edits to the same documents?

- %OPTION% Click **Share > Collaborate with Others**.
- %OPTION% Click **Share > Send a Copy > Mail**.
- %OPTION% Click **Share > Use Keynote Live**.
- %OPTION% Click **Share > Send a Copy > AirDrop**.

#### Q14. How can you fix common image problems with a single click?

- %OPTION% Click the **Auto** button in the **Adjust** panel.
- %OPTION% Right-click a photograph and select **Enhance Image**.
- %OPTION% Click the **Enhance** button in the **Adjustments** panel.
- %OPTION% Select the **Instant Alpha** option.

en.TITLE: Skill Assessments Quizzes
en.DESC:
Collection of questions and answers on different subjects aimed to help
you test your knowledge before an important job interview!

Data from __data__. UI by __bandinopla__

es.TITLE: Questionarios de evaluación de habilidades
es.DESC:
Colección de preguntas y respuestas sobre diferentes temas orientadas a
ayudarte a testear tu conocimiento antes de una importante entrevista de trabajo! 

Datos de __data__. UI por __bandinopla__
